parameters.name: ClassName
parameters.description: Name or class ID for the ActiveX control

parameters.name: LicKey
parameters.description: License key for the ActiveX control

title: ITaskpaneView.AddControl
description: Adds an ActiveX control to the Task Pane view.
signature:
System.Object AddControl( 
   System.String
ClassName
,
   System.String
LicKey
)

parameters.name: ClassName
parameters.description: Name or class ID for the ActiveX control

parameters.name: LicKey
parameters.description: License key for the ActiveX control

returns: Pointer to the IUnknown interface for this ActiveX control
remarks:
If the ActiveX control added is a dialog, then see
Microsoft KB Archive/92905
, "DlgTab.exe - Infinite Loop Moving through Dialog Ctrl". Follow the instructions in this article, or turn off Control Parent in Extended Styles of Dialog for the dialog.
See also
Keystrokes and Accelerator Keys in ActiveX Modeless Dialogs and PropertyManager Pages
.
